summary: With this mod,you can summon 26 Mounts (Horse,Dog,Tyrant,BigDog,Mudcrab,Miner,Eyebot,Eggman,Centurion,Spider,Sphere, Droid,Empress,Ripper,Smasher,Sweeper,Worker,Worm,Old Worker) wherever you want + You can find 27 Companions in the Markath Stable and the Salvius Farm.You can easily DISMISS the mounts.
descriptionHtml:
[color=#ff0000][b][size="7"]Dwemer Mechanicals Mounts and Followers[/size][/b] by gg77[/color] [color=#00ff00]versions 4.0.1 and 4.0.1BIS (NO FOLLOWERS, NO WILDS) [/color]

[color=#00ff00]Optional File: Esp Version Française [/color]

[img]https://i.imgur.com/9htmyrf.gif[/img]

"Dwemer Mechanicals" allow you to summon 26 Dwarven Mechanicals Mounts and (-simple-) Followers wherever you want.

You can easily DISMISS when you want with a "Spell tome:Dismiss Summoned Dwemer Mechanical"

You can find the 27 Followers (with speech) in the Markath Stable and the Salvius Farm.

No DLC required !

To access in Vvardenfell (Morrowind) and Cyrodiil (Oblivion) with these mounts you have the 2 mods WIP: [url=http://morroblivion.com/]SKYWIND and SKYBLIVION [/url]

[url=http://www.hostingpics.net/viewer.php?id=267323spectraldwarvendroid.jpg][img]http://img15.hostingpics.net/pics/267323spectraldwarvendroid.jpg[/img][/url]

[url=http://www.hostingpics.net/viewer.php?id=454287dwemersmechanicalsmounteggmanfollowereggman.jpg][img]http://img11.hostingpics.net/pics/454287dwemersmechanicalsmounteggmanfollowereggman.jpg[/img][/url]

[url=http://www.hostingpics.net/viewer.php?id=275907MountandFollowerandwild.jpg][img]http://img15.hostingpics.net/pics/275907MountandFollowerandwild.jpg[/img][/url]

Dwemer Mechanicals are in this [color=#ff0000]Video[/color] (French version of skyrim, but this mod is in ENGLISH) Merci à "tyrion45" pour cette video

->->->->->->->->->->->->->->->->[youtube]vl8MmI7UJNs[/youtube]<-<-<-<-<-<-<-<-<-<-<-<-<-<-<-

And also in the [color=#ff0000]2nd Video[/color]

Part 1->->->->->->->->->->->->->[youtube]veBzgeBfl7o[/youtube]<-<-<-<-<-<-<-<-<-<-<-<-<-<-<-

Part 2->->->->->->->->->->->->->[youtube]aCzpvt_fsu4[/youtube]<-<-<-<-<-<-<-<-<-<-<-<-<-<-<-

and in this [color=#ff0000]3rd Video[/color] from 12’57’’ ------> to the end (Mod V)

->->->->->->->->->->->->->->->->[youtube]zwFgc7tOu3o[/youtube]<-<-<-<-<-<-<-<-<-<-<-<-<-<-<-

[color=#ff0000] Video with the version 4.0.1 from 8’48’’ to 9’54’’[/color] (Thanks to laiilaiiheii /Just Call Me Frosty)

->->->->->->->->->->->->->->->->[youtube]anC5hKmksqs[/youtube]<-<-<-<-<-<-<-<-<-<-<-<-<-<-<-

[url=http://www.hostingpics.net/viewer.php?id=828075dwemermechanical2.jpg][img]http://img15.hostingpics.net/pics/828075dwemermechanical2.jpg[/img][/url]

[url=http://www.hostingpics.net/viewer.php?id=245790MounthorseFollowerHorse.jpg][img]http://img15.hostingpics.net/pics/245790MounthorseFollowerHorse.jpg[/img][/url]

[color=#ff0000] INSTALLATION (very important)[/color]

[color=#ff8c00][i] Only for the manual installation:[/i][/color]

1) You have to put the folder « Data » in "...Steam/SteamApps/common/skyrim "

[color=#ff8c00][i] For the manual and the NMM installations:[/i][/color]

2)You must place the new .esp at the bottom of the list in the "Data Files" when you launch the game to obtain the 27 books...(Normally, this is done automatically !)

3) (Only if you have download other mods "Summon...") You must INSTALL the summons (my other mods "summon") ONE BY ONE ! (ALL my mods are STANDALONE !)

You can find the “Spell tome: Summon Dwarven XXX”, the "Spell tome:Dismiss Summoned Dwemer Mechanical" and the “Spell tome: Summon Spectral Dwarven XXX”,at Farengar Secret-Fire in Dragonsreach/Fort Dragon (Whiterun/Blancherive) or with an other Spell Vendor (ex: Sybille Stentor in the Blue Palace/Palais Bleu in Solitude).

Duration of the summon: 1 hour (15' for the Dwarven Tyrant and the spectral mounts )

4) You can put in your Skyrim.ini ( user / my documents / my games / Skyrim ) the following settings (you can copy / paste the following):


[Camera]

fVanityModeMaxDist=2000.0000
fVanityModeMinDist=10.0000
fMouseWheelZoomMinDelta=0.0050
fMouseWheelZoomSpeed=0.8000
fMouseWheelZoomIncrement=0.01
fMinCurrentZoom=0.001


These settings allow you to see all mounts (of my mods) correctly, whether your character takes his weapon out or not

[url=http://www.hostingpics.net/viewer.php?id=832731tyrant8.jpg][img]http://img15.hostingpics.net/pics/832731tyrant8.jpg[/img][/url]

[color=#ff0000] Bugs or Problems[/color]

1) You can only have one Follower at a time: if you want a different one (in my other mods), you need to dismiss the first one before you recruit them.

If telling the follower to return at home (With message: “Your companion heads home”) doesn't dismiss him, or if you have "lost" the “active” Follower, you can try this:

Type “²” key to get into console, and type:

set playeranimalcount to 0

2) With [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/15524/?]Amazing Follower Tweaks by Dheuster [/url], or other mod with followers, if problem to dismiss the followers, you can uncheck this mod (AFT or other) in the Data Files when you launch the game

3) If you have any problem with these mounts, you can try a FAST TRAVEL...

[color=#ff0000]With the Follower/Companion Dwarven KEEPER, you have to take out your weapon then left click on the mouse to move forward faster

If you dismount in the water with the Mount Dwarven EGGMAN, it is possible to swim in the air !! Solution: MOUNT AGAIN or SPACEBAR [/color]

The "dragon" can fly when there are enemies, but not with your character...

[url=http://www.hostingpics.net/viewer.php?id=549647MountSpiderFollowerCenturion.jpg][img]http://img11.hostingpics.net/pics/549647MountSpiderFollowerCenturion.jpg[/img][/url]

[color=#ff0000]Credits[/color]

[color=#ff8c00]Razorpony[/color] for the Dwemer Horse in his mod [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/33321 ]Dwemer Steam Horse [/url]("Free modders resource" and "You are allowed to use the assets in this file without permission as long as you credit me")

[color=#ff8c00]UlithiumDragon[/color] for his Dwarven Mudcrab in his mod (modder resource) [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/48180//?]Dwemer Mechanical Mudcrab [/url]

[color=#ff8c00]Vicn [/color] for the meshes of the Dwarven Eyebot, the Dwarven Tyrant, the Dwarven Miner, the Dwarven Droid; the Dwarven Empress; the Dwarven Ripper; the Dwarven Smasher; the Dwarven Sweeper, the Dwarven BigDog, the Dwarven Punisher, the Dwarven Eggman, the Dwarven Worker, the Dwarven Keeper, the Dwarven Worm, the Dwarven Old Worker,the Dwarven Gynoid, the Dwarven Commander and the Dwarven Trooper, in his mod [url=http://naaaaikikvicnvicn.blog.fc2.com/blog-entry-36.html] Vicn Creature Resource [/url](”You can use any parts of this mod without my permission.”) + For the Female Creature (Dwarven Gynoid):
ECE Team,dimon99,Radioragae,REN,Peggy,NewSea,SKS

[color=#ff8c00]Verkister aka me [/color] in his mod [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/58214/?] Dwemer Dog Follower [/url]for the mesh of the Dwemer Dog ("You are allowed to use the assets in this file without permission as long as you credit me ")

[url=http://www.hostingpics.net/viewer.php?id=432816MountSphereFollowerSpider.jpg][img]http://img15.hostingpics.net/pics/432816MountSphereFollowerSpider.jpg[/img][/url]

[url=http://www.hostingpics.net/viewer.php?id=762911MountCenturionFollowerSphere.jpg][img]http://img15.hostingpics.net/pics/762911MountCenturionFollowerSphere.jpg[/img][/url]

[url=http://www.hostingpics.net/viewer.php?id=859577MountmudcrabFollowermudcrab.jpg][img]http://img15.hostingpics.net/pics/859577MountmudcrabFollowermudcrab.jpg[/img][/url]

[color=#ff0000] [b]You have also other Dwemer Mechanicals Mounts in my other Mods ! [/b] [/color]

[color=#00ff00] [b] Dwarven Ballista[/b] [/color] in [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/31538/?tab=1&navtag=%2Fajax%2Fmoddescription%2F%3Fid%3D31538%26preview%3D&pUp=1 ] Monster Mounts Dragonborn[/url] (DLC Dragonborn required)

[color=#00ff00] [b] Dwarven Page[/b] [/color] in [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/31538/?tab=1&navtag=%2Fajax%2Fmoddescription%2F%3Fid%3D31538%26preview%3D&pUp=1] Monster Mounts Dragonborn [/url] and in [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/32265/?] Summon Dragonborn - Mounts and Followers [/url] (DLC Dragonborn required)

[color=#00ff00] [b] Dwarven Charger[/b] [/color] in [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/31538/?tab=1&navtag=%2Fajax%2Fmoddescription%2F%3Fid%3D31538%26preview%3D&pUp=1 ] Monster Mounts Dragonborn [/url] and in [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/32265/?] Summon Dragonborn - Mounts and Followers [/url] (DLC Dragonborn required)

[color=#00ff00] [b]Dwarven Gargoyle [/b] [/color] in [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/30714/?] Summon Gargoyles - Mounts and Followers [/url] and in
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/50787/?]Dual Summon Mounts [/url] (DLC Dawnguard required)

[color=#00ff00] [b] Dwarven Centurion Forgemaster [/b] [/color] in [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/25511/?] Monster Mounts Dawnguard - Montures Monstres Dawnguard [/url] and in [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/30396/?] Dual Summon Mounts [/url] (DLC Dawnguard required)

[color=#00ff00] [b]Dwarven Keeper[/b][/color] is also (as summonable mount) in [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/30534/?]Giants and Mammoths - Mounts and Followers [/url] (DLC Dawnguard required)

[color=#00ff00] [b]Dwarven Punisher[/b][/color] is also (as summonable mount) in [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/30328/?] Summon Werewolf and Co - Mounts and Followers [/url] and in [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/30396/?] Dual Summon Mounts [/url]

files.name: Dwemer Mechanicals Mounts and Followers 4-0-1
files.changelogHtml:
New in the version 4.0.1: New (improved) position on the Dwarven Horse and the Dwarven Big Dog + Cleaned by TesVEdit

New in the version 3.9: Adds a Dwemer Dog (Mount + Follower/Companion) + Now you can summon the Dwarven Tyrant everywhere you want!

New in the version 3.8: You can easily DISMISS when you want with a "Spell tome:Dismiss Summoned Dwemer Mechanical" + minor changes
